title: Gamified Math Competency Enhancement: Transferable Skill Acquisition Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Mobile-based game elements for office/administrative adult learners to develop math problem-solving skills and transferable competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real workplace problems presented in game scenarios through mathematical thinking and derive solutions with 80% accuracy
Learners strengthen data interpretation and decision-making competencies by completing over 90% of weekly quest-style microlearning content
Learners improve communication skills by exchanging peer assessment feedback at least three times through in-game collaborative missions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
